meta.title: Md Shakil Hossen - Striving for Excellence
meta.description: Result driven SEO & Data Analyst with experience in AI automation, analytics and reporting. Skilled in implementing SEO strategies to enhance online presence

hero.title: Step into the World of Data
hero.subtitle: Striving for Excellence!!
hero.content: I don't just follow trends. I set insights and strategy.

about.title: Who I AM
about.subtitle: Introduction
content: I am an experienced Data Analyst and SEO Specialist with expertise in transforming complex data into actionable insights. Throughout my career, I have had the privilege of collaborating with prestigious organizations, contributing to their success and growth through data-driven strategies.

My mission is to bridge the gap between data and business strategy, helping organizations make informed decisions that drive growth and competitive advantage. With a strong foundation in both technical analysis and strategic thinking, I aim to contribute to workflow improvements while continuing to grow professionally.

cards.title: Education
cards.content:
BSc. in Computer Science and Engineering
Daffodil International University
Sep 2020 – Sep 2024

cards.title: Projects
cards.content: Built more than 5 projects in Data Analysis, SEO, and Web Development

cards.title: Languages
cards.content: Python, Flask, React Js, Next Js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

cards.title: SEO and Data Analyst
content: Automated workflow processes with Python and JavaScript. Streamlined data processing and reduced manual tasks by developing custom automation scripts, improving team efficiency, and accelerating data-driven decisions.

Increased website traffic and search rankings by 5x through targeted keyword and competitor research, implementation of Technical SEO strategies, and data optimization using Ahrefs, SEMrush, and Google Search Console.
Transformed raw data into actionable insights by building automated ETL workflows with Pandas and NumPy, improving data accuracy and usability.
Collaborated with Web and Database teams to ensure data compliance and optimize website structure, enhancing SEO performance and user experience based on analytical insights.
Developed interactive Power BI and Excel dashboards to visualize key trends, improving data accessibility and decision-making speed across teams.

cards.title: Web Developer
content: Developed responsive web applications using React JS and CSS to enhance user experience, improving performance and scalability through reusable components.
Designed modular, reusable automation tools that improved team productivity by enabling non-technical stakeholders to generate insights through simple UI triggers.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: What I Offer
services.content: I offer a range of services to help you succeed in the digital world. From data analysis and SEO to web development and UI/UX design, I turn your ideas into impactful results.

cards.title: Data Analyst
cards.content: Analyzing and interpreting complex datasets to uncover trends, provide actionable insights, and support data-driven decision making for businesses.

cards.title: SEO
cards.content: Optimizing websites to rank higher on search engines, driving organic traffic, and improving online visibility.

cards.title: Web Development
cards.content: Building responsive, high-performance websites and web applications using modern technologies and best practices.

cards.title: UI/UX Design
cards.content: Creating intuitive and engaging user interfaces with a focus on user experience and visual aesthetics.

cards.title: SEO Performance Dashboard
cards.content: Comprehensive SEO analytics and performance tracking dashboard

cards.title: Advanced Web Analytics
cards.content: Detailed web traffic analysis and user behavior insights

cards.title: Conversion Rate Optimization
cards.content: Advanced CRO techniques for maximizing website performance

work.title: My Latest Work
work.subtitle: My Portfolio
work.content: Explore my recent projects showcasing expertise in web development, SEO, and data analysis. Each project reflects my commitment to quality and innovation.

cards.title: Deep Learning
cards.content: Advanced machine learning models for data analysis and pattern recognition using TensorFlow and Python.

callToAction.title: Ready to Transform Your Data Into Actionable Insights?
callToAction.content: Let's collaborate to turn your data challenges into opportunities. Get in touch today to discuss how my expertise in SEO and Data Analysis can drive your business forward.
